article_text:
You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters

We scored some GREAT deals at the huge Rue21 clearance sale this weekend! If your kids like this store, now is a good time to check out the deals!

We found fall and winter shirts, sweatshirts and jackets for $2 - $5 and summer shirts for $6.99. Undies were only $1.00. I was really thrilled with the $2 and $5 shirts including adorable Disney character long sleeved shirts with Lion King and Little Mermaid. My teen girls were very happy with their haul! They also had a number of $1 and $3 clearance jewelry and watches.

In the picture above, you can see Mikayla with Rue21 in the 40/42 area showing off the $2 sale sign!

Happy shopping!
